name: Casino Fights
description:
Casino Fights

(If you're experiencing some lag, the downloadable file should run better!)

________________________________

You are a die trying to get their revenge after the people of the poker table took your money and your sides!

Shoot through multiple waves of enemies on the casino table. After every wave you complete, you gain your pips on a new side of one of your faces. Along with the side comes new weapons you can use on the table for future waves! 

Pick up "roulette wheels" to shuffle your sides and be able to use one of the weapons that you have collected, as well as other boosts to your character.

________________________________

Made for GMTK 2022

Micheal  -  Programming & Game Design

Thierno  -  Programming

Evan  -  Music and SFX

Phoenix  -  3D Art & Design

Yahooligan  -  2D Design & Art
